remarks: The value of the initial object function, i.e. the set of all initial objects of a category.  (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
statement:
initoval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
initoval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
initoval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
initoval $p |- ( ph -> ( InitO ` C ) = { a e. B | A. b e. B E! h h e. ( a H b ) } ) $.
$d B a b $.
$d C a b h $.
